label: Book to Bill ratio
name: Book to Bill ratio
script:
sales_orders = len(frappe.get_all("Sales Order", filters={"docstatus": 1}))
sales_invoices = len(frappe.get_all("Sales Invoice", filters={"docstatus": 1}))

data = (sales_invoices/sales_orders) * 100 if sales_orders and sales_invoices else 0
